Package emissary.test.core.junit5

Class RegressionTestUtil

java.lang.Object
emissary.test.core.junit5.RegressionTestUtil
public final class RegressionTestUtil extends Object
This class contains utility methods used by RegressionTest.

  • Method Details

    • getTestResx

      public static Path getTestResx()
      Dynamically finds the src/test/resources directory to write the XML to. Running locally in an IDE, PROJECT_BASE will likely point to src/main/ Running in Maven/Docker it will most likely point to target/

    • checkAnswers

      public static void checkAnswers(org.jdom2.Document answers, IBaseDataObject payload, List<IBaseDataObject> attachments, String placeName, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementDecoders decoders)
      See Also:
      • ExtractionTest.checkAnswers(Document, IBaseDataObject, List, String)

    • getAnswerDocumentFor

      public static org.jdom2.Document getAnswerDocumentFor(String resource)
      When generating XML answer files, we need to use the src version rather than target. This method returns the XML file from that location.
      Parameters:
      resource - to get the answer file for
      Returns:
      the XML file in the src directory (not target)

    • getXmlPath

      public static Path getXmlPath(String resource)
      Gets the XML filename/path for the given resource (a .dat file)
      Parameters:
      resource - path to the .dat file
      Returns:
      path to the corresponding .xml file

    • writeAnswerXml

      public static void writeAnswerXml(String resource, IBaseDataObject initialIbdo, IBaseDataObject finalIbdo, List<IBaseDataObject> results, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementEncoders encoders)
      Generate the relevant XML and write to disk.
      Parameters:
      resource - referencing the DAT file
      initialIbdo - for 'setup' section
      finalIbdo - for 'answers' section
      encoders - for encoding ibdo into XML
      results - for 'answers' section

    • writeXml

      public static void writeXml(String resource, String xmlContent)
      Helper method to write XML for a given DAT file.
      Parameters:
      resource - referencing the DAT file
      xmlContent - to write to the XML answer file

    • setupPayload

      public static void setupPayload(IBaseDataObject payload, org.jdom2.Document answers, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementDecoders decoders)
      Sets up the payload by resetting the payload to that from the XML
      Parameters:
      payload - the ibdo to reset
      answers - an XML Document object to set the ibdo payload to
      See Also:
      • ExtractionTest.setupPayload(IBaseDataObject, Document)

    • getInitialFormFromFilename

      public static String getInitialFormFromFilename(String resource)
      Use the 'default' case of InitialFinalFormFormat to get the initial form to satisfy ExtractionTest.testExtractionPlace(String) picking this up before start
      Parameters:
      resource - to get the form from
      Returns:
      the initial form from the filename

    • setDataToNull

      public static void setDataToNull(IBaseDataObject initialIbdo)
      Allow setting the internal data fields to null to avoid being included during serialisation.
      Parameters:
      initialIbdo - to null out

    • getInitialIbdoWithFormInFilename

      public static IBaseDataObject getInitialIbdoWithFormInFilename(String resource, KffDataObjectHandler kff)
      Simple/default way to provide the initial IBDO Takes the data from the dat file and sets the current (initial) form based on the filename
      Parameters:
      resource - path to the dat file
      Returns:
      the initial IBDO

    • tweakFinalIbdoWithFormInFilename

      public static void tweakFinalIbdoWithFormInFilename(String resource, IBaseDataObject finalIbdo)
      Simple/default way to provide the final IBDO. Will modify the provided IBDO. Sets the current (final) form based on the filename
      Parameters:
      resource - path to the dat file
      finalIbdo - the existing final BDO after it's been processed by a place
